events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The application has been categorized under Engineering roles as the candidate's resume mentions multiple software development projects.
Assigned recruiter John Doe to manage the candidate's hiring process for the software developer position.
Initial screening call completed; candidate demonstrated strong understanding of core software engineering principles.
Candidate responded promptly to the interview invitation and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 7th, focusing on coding and system design challenges.
The candidate completed the technical interview and performed very well, displaying excellent problem-solving skills.
HR interview has been scheduled to discuss the candidate's cultural fit and compensation expectations.
